name: OrganismsTestsByMicroscopicObservationInUnspecifiedTissue
title: Organisms (Tests by Microscopic Observation in Unspecified Tissue)
description: The value set is a combination of microscopic observations for organisms
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with microscopic observation method in unspecified tissue and the result value is nominal (i.e., organism names).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: microscopic observation of organisms in unspecified tissue),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
